name: Polarity (itch) (Reccy)
description:
Lost in Transmission - As a critical data bit racing down a fibre optic cable, navigate hazardous sub-atomic terrain, jump over imperfections in the wire, and even reverse the cable's polarity to flip the surrounding level and gravity for a new set of challenges.

Easy to pick up and play, simple mouse controls conceal a steadily increasing difficulty curve as the pace increases, hazards grow, and the all-consuming virus stalks you every step of the way. Dart around the level at the speed of an electric bolt, but remember to stay close to the edges to charge - without energy you won't last long...

Made for Global Game Jam 2018!
